title: Java Developer with French/German
description:
About Software Development at Sollers:
Versatility is the keyword when it comes to what we do in IT. Development is just the beginning of a long journey where we get familiar with business, processes, and architecture. But at the end of the day, the result is always the same: a ready-to-use solution used by everyone around us.As a Sollers developer, you'll have the opportunity to continuously expand your skill set, navigate complex challenges, and contribute to the creation of solutions that empower businesses and individuals alike. 

 About the role. You will:
• Implement and customise core insurance systems such as Guidewire, Salesforce, TIA or INSIS.• Develop our own systems as a part of the internal R&D team.• Design IT solutions and prepare documentation.• Create unit tests.• Work directly with our clients as an active member of an agile project team. About the role. You will: • Implement and customise core insurance systems such as Guidewire, Salesforce, TIA or INSIS.• Develop our own systems as a part of the internal R&D team.• Design IT solutions and prepare documentation.• Create unit tests.• Work directly with our clients as an active member of an agile project team.

title: IT Infrastructure (Chief) Specialist / Server Operations
description:
We are looking for IT Infrastructure Specialist – Server Operations fot IT Global Infrastructure (Nordics, UK, CE, USA). The person will manage IT systems and infrastructure. Within these tasks, he/she will be reporting directly to the Server Operations Manager in Skanska IT Global Infrastructure. 

Workplace: preferred place of work: Kraków we are also open to other locations (remote work possible)


Provides IT Infrastructure services in Server Operations area for Skanska Global
Installs and manages server Windows Server (Linux not req, but good to have)
Performs virtual server administration (Hyper-V and VMware)
Backs up servers and applications (NetBackup)
Performs scripting (PowerShell)
Manages File service
Works with server hardware in our Data Center in Krakow
Performs system monitoring (SCOM)
Installs and configures network elements
Manages storage
Documentation of Infrastructure
Manages or prepares and implements at least one global IT project in the field of IT infrastructure We are looking for IT Infrastructure Specialist – Server Operations fot IT Global Infrastructure (Nordics, UK, CE, USA). The person will manage IT systems and infrastructure. Within these tasks, he/she will be reporting directly to the Server Operations Manager in Skanska IT Global Infrastructure.  Workplace: preferred place of work: Kraków we are also open to other locations (remote work possible)

title: Senior Golang Developer (eBPF Focused)
description:
Cycode is a complete software supply chain security solution that provides visibility, security, and integrity across all phases of the SDLC. Cycode integrates with DevOps tools and infrastructure providers, hardens their security postures by implementing consistent governance, and reduces the risk of breaches with a series of scanning engines that look for issues like hardcoded secrets, infrastructure as code misconfigurations, code leaks, and more. 
About the role 
Cycode, a cybersecurity startup, is looking for a full-time Senior Golang Engineer (eBPF focused) to join our team. We’re an enterprise security startup pioneering the cybersecurity industry’s first-ever solution for source code control, detection, and response. 
We officially emerged from stealth mid-2019 with backing from YL Ventures and leading cybersecurity executives and experts including Mike Fey (former president & COO of Symantec), Andy Grolnick (former president & CEO, LogRhythm), and Justin Somaini (CSO, Unity Technologies). We’ve been on a roll ever since and are ready to grow our team and reach new milestones. 
This is an incredible opportunity to immerse yourself in the exciting world of cybersecurity and break new ground in source code security, the future of the industry. You’ll work alongside a dynamic team of experts on a passionate mission to make an impact, as well as an incredible network of legendary cybersecurity luminaries and leaders.


Developing high-quality eBPF code while following open source development principles and best practices;
Active participation in the open-source community;
Ability to speak at public conferences about achievements. Cycode is a complete software supply chain security solution that provides visibility, security, and integrity across all phases of the SDLC. Cycode integrates with DevOps tools and infrastructure providers, hardens their security postures by implementing consistent governance, and reduces the risk of breaches with a series of scanning engines that look for issues like hardcoded secrets, infrastructure as code misconfigurations, code leaks, and more. About the role Cycode, a cybersecurity startup, is looking for a full-time Senior Golang Engineer (eBPF focused) to join our team. We’re an enterprise security startup pioneering the cybersecurity industry’s first-ever solution for source code control, detection, and response. We officially emerged from stealth mid-2019 with backing from YL Ventures and leading cybersecurity executives and experts including Mike Fey (former president & COO of Symantec), Andy Grolnick (former president & CEO, LogRhythm), and Justin Somaini (CSO, Unity Technologies). We’ve been on a roll ever since and are ready to grow our team and reach new milestones. This is an incredible opportunity to immerse yourself in the exciting world of cybersecurity and break new ground in source code security, the future of the industry. You’ll work alongside a dynamic team of experts on a passionate mission to make an impact, as well as an incredible network of legendary cybersecurity luminaries and leaders.

title: AI Travel Tech - Senior Node.js Engineer (Remote OR On-site)
description:
Having navigated the Covid Pandemic successfully, my client within the travel tech space is building a new Engineering team in Munich from scratch. Besides working on the existing web platform, you would get a chance to build new products such as an AI booking Tool to diversity their offering. 
What we offer

Company Pension Scheme
Additional Health Insurance
Ability to work 100% remote or on site. Whatever you prefer!
Base salary for our Senior Developers between 60,000-80,000 EUR
Free German classes
Discount on our travel tech platform
Home office as much as you need it
The chance to build a new team and products
Modern office and setup (should you be sick of working from home)
For relocators we offer a relocation package as well as a company flat option
Gym and transport ticket
Training Budget and career coaching
Regular company Events



Senior Web Engineer in a completely new team
Not only code maintenance but the chance to build 4 new products and bring in your ideas to make them a hit with millions of users across the EU
Use a modern tech stack: Node.js, JavaScript, React.js, Redux.js
Work within an agile and continuous delivery environment
You can choose between a Backend focused role or a Fullstack one.
As part of the current growth our client are also looking to Fastrack Engineers into Team Leads, should this be of interest
All starters will get the chance to come and work in the UK Headquarters for an onboarding period (with current vaccine rollout this should be possible by the Summer) Having navigated the Covid Pandemic successfully, my client within the travel tech space is building a new Engineering team in Munich from scratch. Besides working on the existing web platform, you would get a chance to build new products such as an AI booking Tool to diversity their offering. What we offer

title: Senior Software Engineer (Python Back-end AWS)
company: Adtran Networks Sp. z o. o.
description:
Adtran (formerly ADVA) is looking for an outstanding Senior Software Engineer to work on its exciting new Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) product: Mosaic One. Mosaic One is a cloud-based system that aggregates information from many management and orchestration platforms, broadband access, and consumer in-home devices to produce helpful, targeted workflows for our users and AI driven insights that ensure our customers’ success.
The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and continually improving our product using new technologies and best agile practices, and will work closely with other engineers and stakeholders to ensure the product meets the needs of our customers.
The Software Engineer will be a member of a full-stack team responsible for designing, analyzing requirements, developing, implementing, testing, debugging, and maintaining software solutions for Adtran products including but not limited to the following:  application development, system software architecture, software test development, and customer assistance. Requires ability to perform engineering tasks for a major project or for projects of moderate complexity with limited direction. 


Example target projects: design or assist in the design and development of the Mosaic One SaaS product; design or assist in the design and development of CI pipeline infrastructure needed to carry out build and test requirements for Mosaic One. 
Perform or assist in high-level and low-level software design and implementation of new modules and enhancements to existing software.   
Perform or assist in feasibility studies of needed software development.   
Document the design including features definition and architecture.   
Conduct and participate in design reviews and code reviews. 
Plan and perform unit and system level testing of implemented software modules and enhancements. 
Help fix software bugs found during all testing phases. 
Work with team to deploy and test incremental software releases. 
Organize and coordinate development activities within schedule and product constraints. 
Other projects and assignments may result and be assigned to accommodate the changing needs of the department and the Company. Adtran (formerly ADVA) is looking for an outstanding Senior Software Engineer to work on its exciting new Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) product: Mosaic One. Mosaic One is a cloud-based system that aggregates information from many management and orchestration platforms, broadband access, and consumer in-home devices to produce helpful, targeted workflows for our users and AI driven insights that ensure our customers’ success. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and continually improving our product using new technologies and best agile practices, and will work closely with other engineers and stakeholders to ensure the product meets the needs of our customers. The Software Engineer will be a member of a full-stack team responsible for designing, analyzing requirements, developing, implementing, testing, debugging, and maintaining software solutions for Adtran products including but not limited to the following:  application development, system software architecture, software test development, and customer assistance. Requires ability to perform engineering tasks for a major project or for projects of moderate complexity with limited direction.

title: Frontend Developer (JS/TypeScript) - Germany (Relocation + VISA)
description:
Did you know that Germany has 3.5 Million registered companies? Of these, only 1500 count as hidden champions. What are hidden champions you may ask? They are relatively small but highly successful companies. My client is one of them.
They have set out to digitize communication, which is considered a more traditional industry. With a focus on automatization, they have over 1500 customers that rely on their product. 14 of the biggest Banks in Europe and all 5 of the biggest energy providers in Germany have been using their solutions for many years.
With HQ in the Stuttgart area, over half of the company works in IT + Research & Development for innovative technologies. Here they have 200 Employees from over 30 different nationalities spread across 5 locations and are looking for you in order to grow their business even more. 
What is on offer?

Sponsor VISA/relocation
Free language courses
Own Software Engineering Training Academy for individual development
A family-friendly workplace with a parent-child office
Flat hierarchies, short decision-making processes, open-door policy
Company canteen with employee discount on food and drinks
Job bike, subsidized public transport (VVS), free employee parking
Employee events & parties
Free Gym membership
Free Company pension scheme and accident insurance
Health care package



They are looking for a Frontend Engineer with a programming experience of at least 4 years
You will be working on their newest and strongest growing product and be responsible for building and maintaining new features
The main tech stack is JavaScript and Typescript. It is also nice to have experience working with Docker, Kubernetes, and Open Shift
You will actively participate in agile teams (Scrum)
Mutual code reviews and pair programming, continuous integration, and refactoring
Good knowledge of English is required Did you know that Germany has 3.5 Million registered companies? Of these, only 1500 count as hidden champions. What are hidden champions you may ask? They are relatively small but highly successful companies. My client is one of them. They have set out to digitize communication, which is considered a more traditional industry. Here they have 200 Employees from over 30 different nationalities spread across 5 locations and are looking for you in order to grow their business even more. What is on offer?

title: Sports Tech - React Frontend Engineer - 100% Remote OR in Germany
description:
What’s on offer.

Salary up to 80,000 EUR package
Great opportunities for personal and professional growth and an attractive working, dynamically growing, entrepreneurial environment.
High-level responsibility from day one in a highly professional and vibrant IT team, with a steep learning curve, flat command structures and a friendly open-minded culture
Everyday use of modern development tools and frameworks
High degree of responsibility and autonomy
A competitive salary combined with the opportunity to actively shape BSTN’s future.
Participation in conferences and events relevant to your professional and personal development
Regular company and team events as well as a modern and spacious campus, fitness center and a bodega where you get fresh, seasonal meals.



Build new features for their high traffic E-Commerce products in the AWS cloud.
Work with technologies such as: React, Redux, JavaScript, Vue.js, Knockout.js, node.js, AWS, git, Jenkins.
Bring in your ideas and make this Munich founded brand go global.
Keep to best practices, work in an agile, effective, and highly autonomous team in which your opinion matters.
Help create new services, products, and apps from scratch.
Give your input into what technologies should be used for their tech stack. What’s on offer.

title: Digital Health – Senior JavaScript Engineer
description:
Our VC funded client is currently building a web platform that is causing a major shift in an industry known to be outdated and conservative.
As part of this shift they are looking for a Senior JavaScript Engineer to join their tech team of 35 in Munich with the mission of becoming the best IT Team within their given industry.
Your goal as an Engineer will be to help build their large, cleanly architected, modern JavaScript ecosystem. 
The company:

120 employee tech Startup with secured long-term funding
Setup of cross-functional teams and communities (Frontend/Backend Developers, Testing, DevOps, Claims, Marketing etc.)
Around 35 IT Staff and growing
Very involved in the German tech community and known as using the latest technologies on the market
Voted best employer in Germany in IT by an independent organization based on neutral interviews with the current employees
Uses some of following technologies – JavaScript, Docker, Node.js, TypeScript, PHP, redis, AWS, git, Sass, Karma-runner, Terraform, Jenkins, Go, Python, json, Microservices, dredd, firebase, behat, Postresql and many more

What is on offer:

Salary from 70,000-80,000 EUR + yearly Bonus
Company flat
Remote working  
Free Gym
Company Pension Scheme
Mutual feedback culture
Best equipment on the market
Budget for books, e-learning, conferences & coaching
Regular Hackathons
Travel allowance for public transportation
Relocation support
Support with visa application process Our VC funded client is currently building a web platform that is causing a major shift in an industry known to be outdated and conservative. title: Frontend Greenfield Engineer - code Digitalization for All
description:
Our Nürnberg based client has a remarkable vision: to redesign the way small and medium sized businesses across the world manage their digitalization.
As such they are looking to build a new web platform from scratch that will redesign the digitization of millions of companies, not just in the tech space, but across all Industries.
With already over 200,000 companies showing interest through their other product channels, they are looking for Developers to join their ambitious mission and scale their product and Tech Team in Nürnberg. 
What is on offer:

Base salary up to 100,000 EUR + Benefits
Company pension scheme & private health insurance
Holiday flats for employees - multiple vacation homes in Spain and Italy
Remote friendly culture
Free transportation ticket & company car park
Gym membership, participation in B2Run & health programs
You can take our word that you will not be bored in this role. This role is demanding and the tasks vary constantly
The chance to work on a highly complex and innovative product with technologies such as: AWS, Lambda, React, Vue.js, Java, Maven, Spring/Spring Boot, Docker, Kubernetes, Elasticsearch, JavaScript / TypeScript
A truly agile company (yes really!)
MacBooks and company phone as standard. Happy to get you any equipment you need though
Career progression in a highly successful company group and your own tailored training budget Our Nürnberg based client has a remarkable vision: to redesign the way small and medium sized businesses across the world manage their digitalization. As such they are looking to build a new web platform from scratch that will redesign the digitization of millions of companies, not just in the tech space, but across all Industries. With already over 200,000 companies showing interest through their other product channels, they are looking for Developers to join their ambitious mission and scale their product and Tech Team in Nürnberg. title: Frontend Cloud Streaming Developer – React Immersive
description:
Our Munich based client is building a highly innovative web platform in the streaming space. Due to company and sector growth, they are looking to hire across the company, including for the Frontend Engineering Team. 
As a Frontend Engineer you will contribute towards growing out the product further with new features and further product launches in virtual reality and AI. 
This is an opportunity to work on a product that is redefining the entertainment landscape. The opportunity will also allow you to share tech knowledge with Developers from partners such as Netflix, Amazon and Dazn. 
What is on offer:

Option for share ownership in the company + competitive salary
Remote friendly culture
You can take our word that you will not be bored in this role. This role is demanding and the tasks vary constantly.
The chance to work on a highly complex and innovative product with technologies such as: React, JavaScript, Vanilla JS, Preact, WebDriverIO, CI Testing & CD, Video and Audio Streaming, AWS, Apollo, GraphQL, Mustaches and many more
Flat hierarchies. You report directly to the CTO
A truly agile company (yes really!)
MacBooks and company phone as standard. Happy to get you any equipment you need though
Your own tailored training budget
When home office becomes lonely, you can come work in our new office in central Munich Our Munich based client is building a highly innovative web platform in the streaming space. Due to company and sector growth, they are looking to hire across the company, including for the Frontend Engineering Team. As a Frontend Engineer you will contribute towards growing out the product further with new features and further product launches in virtual reality and AI. This is an opportunity to work on a product that is redefining the entertainment landscape. The opportunity will also allow you to share tech knowledge with Developers from partners such as Netflix, Amazon and Dazn. What is on offer:

title: Mid Java Developer
description:
Jesteśmy polską spółką wytwarzającą oprogramowanie, integrującą systemy i aplikacje biznesowe. Doradzamy klientom korporacyjnym  z wielu branż: m.in. telekomunikacyjnej, ubezpieczeniowej, medycznej, FMCG, zarówno w Polsce, jak i za granicą. Ponieważ intensywnie się rozwijamy, poszukujemy utalentowanych juniorów.  Obecnie szukamy juniorów chcących rozwijać swoje umiejętności zarówno backendowe, jak i frontendowe w projektach wspierających i automatyzujących różnego rodzaju procesy biznesowe dla klienta korporacyjnego z branży telekomunikacyjnej. 
Operujemy na stacku Javowym wykorzystując platformę BPM i low-code Bonita. Używamy głównie języków Groovy, JavaScript, SQL  i korzystamy z narzędzi takich jak GIT, Hibernate, Maven, IntelliJ Idea.


implementacja logiki biznesowej w modułach domenowych Java/Groovy w podejściu DDD
implementacja logiki procesowej w BPMN i skryptach Groovy
modelowanie encji (Hibernate/SQL)
tworzenie GUI w narzędziu low code bazującym na AngularJS
integracje z systemami zewnętrznymi
pisanie testów automatycznych (jednostkowych i integracyjnych)
code-review
przygotowywanie procedur wdrożeniowych
identyfikacja i naprawa błędów aplikacji Jesteśmy polską spółką wytwarzającą oprogramowanie, integrującą systemy i aplikacje biznesowe. Doradzamy klientom korporacyjnym  z wielu branż: m.in. telekomunikacyjnej, ubezpieczeniowej, medycznej, FMCG, zarówno w Polsce, jak i za granicą. Ponieważ intensywnie się rozwijamy, poszukujemy utalentowanych juniorów.  Obecnie szukamy juniorów chcących rozwijać swoje umiejętności zarówno backendowe, jak i frontendowe w projektach wspierających i automatyzujących różnego rodzaju procesy biznesowe dla klienta korporacyjnego z branży telekomunikacyjnej. Operujemy na stacku Javowym wykorzystując platformę BPM i low-code Bonita. Używamy głównie języków Groovy, JavaScript, SQL  i korzystamy z narzędzi takich jak GIT, Hibernate, Maven, IntelliJ Idea.

title: Full-stack Developer #PHP #JavaScript Cross-Channel Solution - E-business innovation
description:
Join my client’s team where eCommerce is more than just a job – it’s a passion. They specialize in eCommerce solutions for brand manufacturers with retailer integration and have been advising clients on eCommerce and mCommerce for many years. They offer multi-channel solutions for international manufacturers and their distribution partners.
As a Full-Stack Developer, you'll be joining a passionate and innovative team dedicated to empowering clients in the digital world. You'll play a crucial role in developing and maintaining their web platform, creating new modules for their eCommerce application, and designing and implementing web-based software.
Joining this team means more than just a job - you'll have a fulfilling career with growth opportunities. You'll work on exciting projects with diverse national and international clients and be part of a success-driven team. 
 What is on offer?

Salary up to 70k Eur base + Bonus & Benefits
Work from-home allowance and budget for training courses
Remote working 2-3 days per week
A nice office by Lake Starnberg
A safe and stable Job in the booming streaming Industry
Open culture, transparent and bureaucracy-free organization
State-of-the-art coffee machines, free snacks, fruits and beverages
A lot of responsibility and decision-making power in a growing and dynamic environment Join my client’s team where eCommerce is more than just a job – it’s a passion. They specialize in eCommerce solutions for brand manufacturers with retailer integration and have been advising clients on eCommerce and mCommerce for many years. They offer multi-channel solutions for international manufacturers and their distribution partners. As a Full-Stack Developer, you'll be joining a passionate and innovative team dedicated to empowering clients in the digital world. You'll play a crucial role in developing and maintaining their web platform, creating new modules for their eCommerce application, and designing and implementing web-based software. Joining this team means more than just a job - you'll have a fulfilling career with growth opportunities. You'll work on exciting projects with diverse national and international clients and be part of a success-driven team. What is on offer?

title: Full-Stack Mastery - Fintech 5.0
description:
With online transactions surpassing $1 trillion globally, the demand for expert developers to lead the change has never been higher. 
Picture this: You'll be part of a full-service platform connecting retailers, brands, and consumers globally, handling billions of requests every minute. The products you create will empower partners and drive solutions in payment processing. Sound interesting? Chances are you've used their products in the last 24 hours, and now you have the chance to work on them!
Join the game-changing team at my client's company and help shape the future of payments. They're looking for a Senior Full-Stack Developer with a passion for innovation to take on a lead role alongside the Team Lead. 
Benefits:

Employee stock options, shopping voucher benefits
International projects and collaboration opportunities
Casual dress code, food and drinks provided
Personal development opportunities, regular social events.
Hybrid work
Office location: Munich (relocation provided if needed)

Ready to make your mark on the payments industry? 


Write top-notch PHP and JavaScript code
Optimize software through testing and development
Collaborate with the team on web solution design and development
Mentor and lead junior developers
